Module io.helidon.dbclient
Package io.helidon.dbclient.spi

Interface DbClientProviderBuilder<T extends DbClientProviderBuilder<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the builder extending implementing this interface.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Builder<DbClient>, Supplier<DbClient>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JdbcDbClientProviderBuilder, MongoDbClientProviderBuilder
    public interface DbClientProviderBuilder<T extends DbClientProviderBuilder<T>>
extends Builder<DbClient>
    Database provider builder.

                   Class<TYPE> mappedClass)
        Add a custom mapper.
        Type Parameters:
        TYPE - type of the supported class
        Parameters:
        dbMapper - the mapper capable of mapping the mappedClass to various database objects
        mappedClass - class that this mapper supports
        Returns:
        updated builder instance.

        T addService​(DbClientService clientService)
        Add an interceptor. This allows to add implementation of tracing, metrics, logging etc. without the need to hard-code these into the base.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        updated builder instance
